name: Touhou Yuki-no-Jigoku
description:
Description

A Shmup like you have never seen before !
A storm from hell will crush you ! Youmu has dechained her powers, and has decided to protect the snowy path leading to the Death Realm. Reimu will face these dangers, in those dark hours... But a new threat is coming through the horizon that will destroy the balance between the world of living and spirits ...
While banishing the Yokai, Youmu will find her way with runes. They give her a power that can only be freed with three on the same time.

Controller
  • Xbox Controller : use the Left joystick for move, and use R2 or L2  to use the powerfull spell of your 3 runes combination.
  • On Keyboard : directive arrows or ZQSD (swap keyboard mapping) for movements, use the "F" key to use the powerfull spell of your 3 runes combination.
Patch Note
  • 0.0.1 : Base Version
  • 0.0.2 : Fixed some runes combos
Misc

We will try to add a web version soon !

Feel free to ask us for any information/problem, we will try to help you. Futher more we may post an updated version, if there is any breaking bug. Obviously you can rate whatever version you want !

Thanks for playing ! <3
